<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;SPIRVGenTables.inc&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace SPIRV</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Misc functions for looking up builtins and veryfying requirements using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TableGen records</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv">SPIRV</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Parses the name part of the demangled builtin call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a1f67f9d068986121afe18f99677d1687"><Highlight kind="normal">std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a1f67f9d068986121afe18f99677d1687">lookupBuiltinNameHelper</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> DemangledCall,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a73ec33e21dcd539a96251529dc3e9">FPDecorationId</a> &#42;DecorationId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::string PassPrefix = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;(anonymous namespace)::&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string BuiltinName;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Itanium Demangler result may have &quot;(anonymous namespace)::&quot; prefix</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2cd8968ff703aaeb395dcd63f6805ff1">starts&#95;with</a>(PassPrefix.c&#95;str()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    BuiltinName = DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(PassPrefix.length());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    BuiltinName = DemangledCall;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract the builtin function name and types of arguments from the call</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// skeleton.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  BuiltinName = BuiltinName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(0, BuiltinName.find(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;(&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Looks up the demangled builtin call in the SPIRVBuiltins.td records using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the provided \\p DemangledCall and specified \\p Set.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The lookup follows the following algorithm, returning the first successful</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">/// match:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 Search with the plain demangled name (expecting a 1:1 match).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 Search with the prefix before or suffix after the demangled name</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">/// signyfying the type of the first argument.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns Wrapper around the demangled call and found builtin definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;const SPIRV::IncomingCall&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba7165df55c01bd2653b37a6e9f4a8ae"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba7165df55c01bd2653b37a6e9f4a8ae">lookupBuiltin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> DemangledCall,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">              SPIRV::InstructionSet::InstructionSet Set,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ReturnRegister, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8555f84b0afdf8f97a3dff75ed354ec2">SPIRVType</a> &#42;ReturnType,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerkernelarguments-cpp/#a1161e5a4e753384aaba3a8e4533c4261">Arguments</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string BuiltinName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a1f67f9d068986121afe18f99677d1687">SPIRV::lookupBuiltinNameHelper</a>(DemangledCall);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look up the builtin in the defined set. Start with the plain demangled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// name, expecting a 1:1 match in the defined builtin set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirv/demangledbuiltin">SPIRV::DemangledBuiltin</a> &#42;Builtin;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;h&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Set == SPIRV::InstructionSet::OpenCL&#95;std ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">          Set == SPIRV::InstructionSet::GLSL&#95;std&#95;450)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">        Prefix = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;f&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If argument-type name prefix was added, look up the builtin again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Prefix.empty() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">        (Builtin = SPIRV::lookupBuiltin(Prefix + BuiltinName, Set)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRV::IncomingCall&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If lookup with a prefix failed, find a suffix to be added to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an unsigned value has a suffix &quot;u&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::string Suffix;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      Suffix = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;u&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These queries ask for a single size&#95;t result for a given dimension index, e.g</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size&#95;t get&#95;global&#95;id(uint dimindex). In SPIR-V, the builtins corresonding to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// these values are all vec3 types, so we need to extract the correct index or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// return defaultVal (0 or 1 depending on the query). We also handle extending</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or tuncating in case size&#95;t does not match the expected result type&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bitwidth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a constant index &gt;= 3 we generate:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  %res = OpConstant %SizeT 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For other indices we generate:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  %g = OpVariable %ptr&#95;V3&#95;SizeT Input</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  OpDecorate %g BuiltIn XXX</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  OpDecorate %g LinkageAttributes &quot;&#95;&#95;spirv&#95;BuiltInXXX&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  OpDecorate %g Constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  %loadedVec = OpLoad %V3&#95;SizeT %g</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Then, if the index is constant &lt; 3, we generate:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %res = OpCompositeExtract %SizeT %loadedVec idx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  If the index is dynamic, we generate:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %tmp = OpVectorExtractDynamic %SizeT %loadedVec %idx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %cmp = OpULessThan %bool %idx %const&#95;3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %res = OpSelect %SizeT %cmp %tmp %const&#95;0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  If the bitwidth of %res does not match the expected return type, we add an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  extend or truncate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab28508dbb1f9996154ae13f70fa4f2e2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab28508dbb1f9996154ae13f70fa4f2e2">genWorkgroupQuery</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirv/incomingcall">SPIRV::IncomingCall</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><Highlight kind="normal">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIRBuilder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><Highlight kind="normal">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry">SPIRVGlobalRegistry</a> &#42;GR,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><Highlight kind="normal">                              SPIRV::BuiltIn::BuiltIn BuiltinValue,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><Highlight kind="normal">                              uint64&#95;t DefaultValue) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SelectionResult = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;ReturnRegister;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#aac0431719235a7ccda58a3df4894d130"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8555f84b0afdf8f97a3dff75ed354ec2">SPIRVType</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#aac0431719235a7ccda58a3df4894d130">lowerBuiltinType</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpaqueType,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><Highlight kind="normal">                            SPIRV::AccessQualifier::AccessQualifier AccessQual,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><Highlight kind="normal">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIRBuilder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><Highlight kind="normal">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry">SPIRVGlobalRegistry</a> &#42;GR) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In LLVM IR, SPIR-V and OpenCL builtin types are represented as either</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// target(...) target extension types or pointers-to-opaque-structs. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// approach relying on structs is deprecated and works only in the non-opaque</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer mode (-opaque-pointers=0).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In order to maintain compatibility with LLVM IR generated by older versions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of Clang and LLVM/SPIR-V Translator, the pointers-to-opaque-structs are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;translated&quot; to target extension types. This translation is temporary and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be removed in the future release of LLVM.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
